name: Dockside
description:
Dockside is a cozy little game about fishing.

You play as a fisher who was hired by a trio of restaurateurs to catch fish for their yearly Lunar Tide Festival. Relax and enjoy the calm of fishing, and the colorful cast of cooks~

Features:

  • Talk with fun little guys!
  • Catch fish!
  • Sell 'em!

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • Click to fish/interact
  • Left Shift + Q to quit

by Pog Productions
- Art by Madison Sarmiento
- Sound by Marty
- Code by Andrew Sanford and Juniper Watson
- Game Documentation by Lien and Fionna Quach

Made with Unity

Github: https://github.com/Sulfurous-Impersonation/Dockside

L Shift + Q to quit
